abstract: Russian officials say all 61 passengers and crew on board Flydubai plane crashed during second attempt to land at Rostov-on-Don airport; state television reports poor weather conditions may have been factor in crash.
lead_paragraph: Russian officials said on Saturday that all 61 people on board a passenger jet flying from Dubai to southern Russia were killed when their plane crashed on its second attempt to land at Rostov-on-Don airport.

headline.main: Plane Crashes in Russia, All 61 People on Board Killed
headline.print_headline: 737 Jet From Dubai Crashes in Russia, Killing All 61 Aboard

snippet: Russian officials said on Saturday that all 61 people on board a passenger jet flying from Dubai to southern Russia were killed when their plane crashed on its second attempt to land at Rostov-on-Don airport.
